longBusinessSummary: Battery Future Acquisition Corp. does not have significant operations. It intends to effect a merger, capital share exchange, asset acquisition, stock purchase, reorganization, or similar business combination with one or more businesses. The company intends to search on industries spearheading the shift from fossil fuels to electrification, including companies in the battery value chain. Battery Future Acquisition Corp. was incorporated in 2021 and is based in Miami, Florida.

companyOfficers.name: Mr. Gregory Pentland Martyr BEc, LLB
companyOfficers.title: CEO & Director
